about_the_game:
🌑 About the Game 🌑
Inside beckons you to journey through an enigmatic, shadow-laden forest. Here, it's not just the surroundings that induce fear, but the very tricks your mind plays on you. The boundaries blur between reality and illusion, crafting an unparalleled psychological horror experience.

🎮 Gameplay 🎮
This isn't your typical adventure. In this realm, your flashlight becomes your sole beacon and defense. You won't directly confront the lurking threats, but you'll hear them — footsteps, whispers, the chilling proximity of the unknown.

⏰ Duration ⏰
The demo promises an immersive experience spanning 20 to 25 minutes. As the clock ticks, a path will emerge. What lies at its end? Only the brave will discover.
